title: Tank Item
body:
A tank item that gives you the ability to swap positions with another player.

Allowing you to swap with them if they get hooked, stunned or slowed, making the enemy champ (or team) focus you instead of your ally.

So if a thresh hooks onto ur ADC and you are Allistar, you can swap out, head in form thresh's hook and start CCing the hell out of them. It's pretty much a risky engag that every can obtain. Give it mainly tank stats, prob armour AP and health. Kind like how Zhonyas is a uniqe tool for anyone, giving them a few seconds of immunity, this can be a unique item to give those thank lack engages a chance to get into the fight.

replies.body: there'd be so much potential if riot just released a whole bunch of fun new items. black market brawlers items were literally the most fun thing about the mode. dead mans plate is a great appropriate item to have brought into the game permanently but now i still feel limited in the way i can play a champ in simply his build path if that makes cents

Sounds a little like Vengeful Spirit's ultimate. (Dota 2)

It does sound useful, but unfortunately you might get a troll that uses it to swap a squishy into the middle of the enemy team. I mean, if they add a check for enemy CC on the target you want to swap with (similar to how the crucible works on removing CC) then it would be a great item for the tanks to potentially make some great saves.
wow you're right. i cant imagine how much destruction that can cause for your own team. as if bard and tahm kench werent enough as an already enormous potential for trolling
crucible does same thing - the swap

Yeah..... That's broken as fuck.

Maybe like a new champion could have an ult like that? or an ability with a godawfully long cooldown? But no way that's gonna be made available for everyone.
